result.name: oc_group_preferences
result.question_text: <!-- On-Call Group Preferences -->

result.sys_name: How often does 1 shift repeat?
result.name: repeats
result.help_text: The repetition interval determines how long it will take to rotate each member in the schedule. For example , if the option "Daily" is selected , then each member's shift in your schedule will rotate on a daily basis. Additionally if "Weekly" is selected then each shift will continue for a week before rotating to the next member in your roster. Members will be defined in the next section of the wizard. You will be able to refine your choices after creating the schedule
result.question_text: How often does 1 shift repeat?

result.sys_name: Which Members would you like to be in your Schedule?
result.name: members
result.help_text: Move the Members you would like to be in your Schedule from the Available list box to the Selected list box
result.question_text: Which Members would you like to be in your Schedule?

result.sys_name: Rotation interval
result.name: rotation_interval_type
result.question_text: Rotation interval

result.sys_name: How long should we wait until sending the next reminder?
result.name: time_between_reminders
result.help_text: With this option you select the amount of time to await a response before sending a reminder. If you want another time than what is available in the options you can either tweak the value at a later point when the On-Call Schedule is set up or add the value to the list by modifying the variable "time_between_reminders" in the Create On-Call Schedule Wizard.
result.question_text: How long should we wait until sending the next reminder?

result.sys_name: How many Duty rotations are there in your On-Call Schedule?
result.name: duty_rotations
result.help_text: Duty rotations define the Roster that allows you to set an order of escalation. The simplest On-Call Schedule contains only one Roster. Selecting more than one generates multiple Rosters with the same Members shifted by one position in each.
result.question_text: How many Duty rotations are there in your On-Call Schedule?
